summary: Provides a Qiskit implementation of the Fourier checking algorithm, building a quantum circuit that applies Hadamard layers and phase-oracle operations for two Boolean functions, then computes the likelihood of obtaining the all‑zero measurement to resolve the promised correlation decision problem.
business_intent: Enables researchers and developers to run the Fourier checking quantum algorithm within Qiskit, facilitating studies of quantum speed‑up for correlation testing and supporting quantum algorithm benchmarking and education.
